inputs.name: source
inputs.label: Source Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies the base directory for all source globbing patterns.

inputs.name: target
inputs.label: Target Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies the directory to which ClickOnce packages will be published. If a relative path is specified, it will be relative to the Source directory. This directory will be automatically excluded from all source globbing patterns.

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies the version of the deployment. This need not be (and usually isn't) the same as the version of the application. Must be a dotted version number with 1 to 4 elements, each less than 63356. If not specified, the version number of the EntryPoint is used.

inputs.name: launchMode
inputs.label: Launch Mode
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies whether the application can be launched from the Start menu, from a URL, or both. Also allows browser-hosted deployments (Internet Explorer only).

options.both: Launchable from Start menu or a URL
